description: News about University of Richmond, including commentary and archival articles published in The New York Times.
title: University of Richmond
title_page: University of Richmond - The New York Times
maintext:
Vocations
Portraying 18th-Century Black Men in Colonial Williamsburg
Through research and imagination, an actor interprets the lives of enslaved people, as well as some who were free. Often, he knows only their name, age and job.
